headline: A Look at Disney’s (DIS) Valuation After Legal Setbacks and Streaming Disputes Shape Investor Sentiment
summary: Walt Disney (DIS) is facing pressure after a German court granted InterDigital an injunction over patent infringement linked to video streaming technology. This legal setback comes at a time when Disney is also managing other challenges to its digital platforms. See our latest analysis for Walt Disney. Legal disputes and distribution tussles have made headlines for Disney lately, with a recent German injunction over video streaming patents and ongoing negotiations with YouTube TV catching...
